actions.name: Wandering Spirit

cost.trigger: The user is hit by a [Contact] attack.

actions.description:
Trigger: The user is hit by a [Contact] attack.

Effect: The user swaps 1 Ability the triggering creature has and with Wandering Spirit for the rest of combat. Copied abilities with a Trigger that requires the user to switch in activate with this effect. [Legendary], [Innate], and [Forme Change] abilities cannot be swapped.
